original_text: David also won a battle against Hadadezer, king of Zobah. He won land as far as Hamath. That happened when Hadadezer took his army to the Euphrates river to show that he had authority there.
korean_text: 소바 왕 하닷에셀이 유브라데 강 가에서 자기 세력을 펴고자 하매 다윗이 그를 쳐서 하맛까지 이르고

sentences.original_text: David also won a battle against Hadadezer,
He won land as far as Hamath.
That happened when Hadadezer took his army
sentences.korean_translation: 그 일은 하다데셀이 그의 군대를 이끌 때 일어났다.

sentences.original_text: to show that he had authority there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그곳에 권위가 있음을 보여주기 위해.
